Row.Text: Well met. I am Sun Quan, a member of the royal Sun family. Do you realize my vision of leadership?
For the pride of the Sun family, I greet you welcome!
Greetings, fellow leader! The Sun family is known for being True Warriors of the Three Kingdoms... I, too, must live up to this name.
So the land has chosen you...if only I had more experience...
I am no match for you. Your accomplishments just pile up, battle after battle
To think that the gap between Father and me is still so wide...
I shall claim this battlefield in the name of the Sun family!
I'll show you the strength of the Sun family!
I shall show no mercy, for the pride of the Sun family!
All the learning in the world won't teach you how to defeat me! For the family of the Sun!
Halt! You must be stopped for the future of Wu!
You have done enough! This is where you end!
I demand this for the Sun family!
Perhaps you could be of assistance?
I come for this.
The fates have chosen you...of all people...
That is not enough! More!
This will not do! I demand more for the Sun family!
This will not suffice!
I know you are reasonable, I ask of more.
This cannot suffice, could you give more?
No. Not quite enough.
As it stands, this offer is not beneficial me. Please change it.
Can't you do a little more?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost…
For the ultimate future of Wu, I must order you to leave right now!
I am sorry, however this deal will just not work out.
I don't find your offer satisfactory. Now please leave.
Ngh... very well!
Very good! I expect nothing less from one who fights alongside the Sun family!
A fair agreement, It is done.
Here are my terms, take them into consideration.
By accepting this, you would do the Sun family a great honor!.
I believe this will benefit both of our kingdoms. What about it?
Get out! You do not deserve to be in the presence of a member of the Sun family!
I am sorry, but I cannot accept your request.
No. Please leave.
Ngh... it does not seem as if I have a choice in this matter. I will not forget this!
The Sun family never forgets a favor.
Fine, fine. Very well! Don't you dare underestimate me though!
You want to go this way? Then you'll have to defeat me first!
It is going to take all the strength you can muster to defeat me!
You would dare to incur my wrath with such cheap tactics?
Ahahaha! I can understand your passion. I often do the same thing
You're by yourself? No. No names. I'll forget you anyway.
How foolish!
Behold! I am a true warrior of the Three Kingdoms!
Well met. What do you need?
Do you need anything?
You do not deserve to be here. What is it?
I'll cut you down!
The land will not be yours, you know it to be true. Then let us bring an end to this!
You had best follow what I order of you.
Would you not mind to trade these?
Our open borders will lead to a brighter future for both of our empires!
